thread.title: Apple Watch selling well in China
thread.title_full: Apple Watch selling well in China - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Apple Watch selling well in China
text: Following an initial strong performance out of the gate, Apple Watch sales have been widely regarded as on the slump according to several pieces of analysis we’ve seen -- although the latest snippet concerning the Chinese market is more optimistic. As you may be aware, the iPhone 6 models have been doing very well over in China, and Apple’s smartwatch has also shifted a considerable amount of units. In total, Apple Watch sales have crept over the 1.07 million mark in the country, according to figures released by a Chinese app monitoring outfit, TalkingData (as spotted by Business Insider). Unsurprisingly,… [Continue Reading] »
